vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Μεσσίας, -ου, ὁ (Aram. מְשִׁיחָא = Heb. מָשִׁיחַ = Χριστός, which see),
Messiah: Jhn.1:42 4:22.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Messiah, Anointed One; see also G5986, "anointed"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Messiah, Anointed One; see also G5986, "anointed"
the Messiah, the Anointed One, i.q. ὁ Χριστός, Jn. 1:42, 4:25*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Mesías (arameo y hebreo que equivalen al griego Christos)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
彌賽亞 这个陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "受膏者"
1) 彌賽亞的希臘文拼音
2) 基督的名字 (約 1:41, 4:25)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
弥赛亚 这个阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 "受膏者"
1) 弥赛亚的希腊文拼音
2) 基督的名字 (约 1:41, 4:25)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Mê-si, Chúa Cứu Thế. « Đấng chịu xức dầu » H4899
